SELECT tp.id, tp.product_process_status, tp.product_name, tp.product_code, tp.product_specification_model, tp.product_state, tp.product_remarks, tp.product_filing_person, tp.product_created_date, tp.product_view_picture, ppa.purchase_parameters_name productMaterial, ppb.purchase_parameters_name productMeteringCompany, tp.product_theoretical_weight, tp.product_minimum_unit, tp.product_production_monovalent, tpcb.product_category_name productGeneralCategory, tpca.product_category_name productSubclass, tp.product_inventory_quantity, tp.product_recent_warehousing FROM jr_technology_product tp LEFT JOIN jr_purchase_parameters ppa ON ( tp.product_material_id = ppa.id ) LEFT JOIN jr_purchase_parameters ppb ON ( tp.product_metering_company_id = ppb.id ) LEFT JOIN jr_technology_product_category tpca ON ( tp.product_subclass_id = tpca.id ) LEFT JOIN jr_technology_product_category tpcb ON ( tp.product_general_category_id = tpcb.id ) ORDER BY tp.product_created_date DESC
